TopicTitle: Problems with Pre-Order Confirmation E-mail, reply here

Articles.Content: donated $10 a week ago but still havent got an email

Hi, I pre ordered on the 12/08/2011

I got the email about thanking me for me donation, but no email confirming the pre order, as I donated $10, I have the paypal one too, saying it went through

I do like the game and why I wanted to support it, buy the full version that is comming
I also pre-ordered on 12th August, got the 'Thanks for your donation' email but no pre-order confirmation email
Just got mine come through, I'm guessing the volume of pre-orders has caused a backlog? Ordered 13th August, got the email on the 29th. Not complaining though, I'm just glad it's sorted
Just got my preorder confirmation email. Thanks!
still nothing in my inbox, but I guess if the email server was overloaded, then that makes sense, just have to wait a bit more

Finally i recived my preorder confirmation email, but i dont recived 'Thanks for your donation' mail and my KSB store is still empty.

Strange.
Received my pre-order email this morning, thanks!

Weird, I got the confirmation email, but not the email that says that I will get the confirmation email. Either way, thanks for working hard guys!

Dear [my name],

Thank you for pre-ordering Kerbal Space Program. Your forum's username and password will be stored for all future releases. Please keep this email as reference.

Happy launching!!

Thank you guys for letting us know...

We are still working on your confirmation e-mails!

Cheers!

However, some of you guys have received the e-mail in another address that is not linked to our forums, so please check that address too

=)
Same problems here--PayPal email only.

Same as Ranger Danger

Dear [my name],

Thank you for pre-ordering Kerbal Space Program. Your forum's username and password will be stored for all future releases. Please keep this email as reference.

Happy launching!!
got the email this morning, wonderful and thanks

I've never received that confirmation email, but this one:

[...] 'If you've contributed 7.00 USD or more, you will receive an email confirming your pre-order in the next 24 hours' [...]

(August 13rd, 2011)

Â¿Should I worry?
I checked all places...the only e-mail I got is the thank you for the $7.00
I have not received my email either and it has been more than enough time.

I've decided to go along with it, and if I don't get the game then I'll make an issue out of it. Currently, I'm going to trust the devs.

EDIT: I just got it. XD

Helloooww (with Seinfeld's silly belly button voice)

I pre ordered and did not receive the email. What now?

edit: forgot to say that I did check the spam box before posting
Received, thank you!

Can't seem to find my preorder confirmation email, not sure if one was sent. Have the receipt Paypal sent me to confirm my donation if that's required.

Thanks in advance

Nothing for me either, ordered August 13th.

I got a PayPal confirmation, but nothing from KSP. My PayPal email differs from my profile one here, but nothing at either.

I donated on Aug 21.
Hi, i have not received a pre-order e-mail, I donated $1 then $6 which means I should have a pre-order e-mail but I do not
